GameObject
Class StageData

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.StageData

public class StageData
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a model used to specify how stages can be created, and the specific interface needed to generate the enemy and powerup information on the Grid.

Constructor Summary
StageData(EnemySet[] enemiesPresent, PowerUpType powerUpPresent, boolean isBonusStage)
          The constructor used to define the Data elements present in a given stage, specifically, the enemy types present and their numbers, the powerup type present, and whether the stage is a bonus stage or not.

Constructor Detail

StageData

public StageData(EnemySet[] enemiesPresent,
                 PowerUpType powerUpPresent,
                 boolean isBonusStage)
The constructor used to define the Data elements present in a given stage, specifically, the enemy types present and their numbers, the powerup type present, and whether the stage is a bonus stage or not.

Parameters:
enemiesPresent - An array of EnemySet objects containing the enemyType and multiplicity present on the game grid.
powerUpPresent - A PowerUpType object specifying the powerup present in the stage
isBonusStage - A boolean specifying whether the stage is a Bonus stage or not.
Method Detail

getEnemiesPresent

public EnemySet[] getEnemiesPresent()
Get the data regarding which enemies are present in the stage.

Returns:
An array of EnemySet objects specifying the enemy types present on the stage and their multiplicity.

public void setEnemiesPresent(EnemySet[] enemiesPresent)

getPowerUpPresent

public PowerUpType getPowerUpPresent()
Get the powerup type present in the stage.

Returns:
A PowerUpType object specifying the kind of powerup present in the stage.

setPowerUpPresent

public void setPowerUpPresent(PowerUpType powerUpPresent)

isBonusStage

public boolean isBonusStage()
Get the boolean representing whether the stage is a bonus stage or not.

Returns:
A boolean representing whether a the stage is a bonus stage or not.
